manpage.title: ovs-bpfctl
manpage.p: ovs-bpfctl -- administer Open vSwitch BPF state
This utility can be used to probe and manage OVS BPF state.

dl.dd: Prints a brief overview of the current BPF configuration state.
Loads a BPF datapath implementation from filename into the kernel, and pins it to the filesystem.

manpage.p: Please report corrections or improvements to <bugs@openvswitch.org>
